root.title: ge ge sai amr amr order worth 650 mln dlr
root.body: gener electr co sai amr corp oprder ge cfg 80c2 engin power 25 new airbu industri a300 600r 15 boe co ba 767 300er twinjet worth 650 mln dlr compani sai order largest singl on ever receiv commerci aircraft engin amr announc order earlier todai ge sai deliveri will start earli 1988
